item.title: Visiting UK
item.description: I’ve been on vacation over the last days and due to the fact that the time together with Heiner and Norman was great I wanted to write something meaningful - but I’m not a good writer when it comes to non technical stuff and therefore that’s what happend: Altenburg, RyanAir, Boeing 737 , Great Britain, Pound sterlin, Stansted, London, Tube, CCTV, Kings Cross, Hostel, St. Pancras, Pizza, Pub, Beerhouse Act, Pint, Bunk bed, Cereals, Watterloo station, London Eye, Shell game, House of Parliament, Big Ben, Westminster Abbey, Churchill, St.
